# CA Intermediate - Group I

The **second level** of your CA journey.

slides.title: Cost Accounting
slides.content:
# Paper 3 - Cost

## Cost Classification

| Basis | Types |
|-------|-------|
| Element | Material, Labor, Overhead |
| Behavior | Fixed, Variable |
| Function | Production, Admin, Selling |

## Cost Sheet

```
Prime Cost = DM + DL

Works Cost = Prime + FOH

Cost of Production = Works + Admin

Total Cost = CoP + Selling
```

slides.title: Budgeting and Standards
slides.content:
# Planning and Control

## Budget Types

| Type | Approach |
|------|----------|
| Fixed | One level |
| Flexible | Multiple levels |
| Zero-based | From scratch |

## Standard Costing

```
Variance = Actual - Standard

Favorable: Actual < Standard
Adverse: Actual > Standard
```

## Variance Analysis

| Variance | Formula Concept |
|----------|----------------|
| Material price | (AP-SP) x AQ |
| Material usage | (AQ-SQ) x SP |
| Labor rate | (AR-SR) x AH |
| Labor efficiency | (AH-SH) x SR |

slides.title: Marginal Costing
slides.content:
# Decision Making

## Contribution

```
Contribution = Sales - Variable Cost

P/V Ratio = Contribution / Sales

BEP = Fixed Cost / Contribution per unit
```

## Applications

| Decision | Basis |
|----------|-------|
| Make or buy | Relevant cost |
| Accept/reject | Contribution |
| Key factor | Contribution per unit of limiting factor |

slides.title: Income Tax - Introduction
slides.content:
# Paper 4 - Tax

## Tax Computation

```
Gross Total Income
- Chapter VI-A deductions
= Total Income
x Tax Rate
= Tax
- Rebate/Relief
= Net Tax
```

## Heads of Income

| Head | Examples |
|------|----------|
| Salary | Employment |
| House Property | Rent |
| PGBP | Business |
| Capital Gains | Asset sale |
| Other Sources | Interest |
